response.message:
I think I kind of agree what you are saying: the content in Skyrim is worth two epic games, not just one.

(Too bad saying "Elder Scrolls and Skyrim" was most likely not intentional, but you did it twice!)
The Elder Scrolls and Skyrim count as two epic games now?? I know Skyrim tromped Modern Warfare 3 during the launch event, but you could have at least mentioned the competition!

Skyrim is JUST THAT EPIC, you guys!!! 

(These were intentional mistakes to make sure you guys were paying attention. They have now been removed.)

Yep. Skyrim tromped MW3 so badly that we counted it twice.

Just kidding it was a typo. Thanks for pointing it out.
As one who has seen the Stack Exchange machine grow since it's infancy as stackoverflow.com, I must say I am now as proud to use your sites as I am to eat a hamburger at McDonald's.  Congratulations!
Am I the only one who remembers CHAOS (or was it KAOS) to be the name of the evil organisation in the TV show (and movie) 'Get Smart' and who went head to head against the good guys named CONTROL?
